metadata.title: CVE-2022-26385 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In unusual circumstances, an individual thread may outlive the thread's manager during shutdown. This could have led to a use-after-free causing a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 98.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26385` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 1:1snap1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1snap1-0ubuntu1').
